function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Increase in organic and inorganic waste due to online shopping and medical waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in waste recycling due to concerns about covid-19 transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Repeal of disposable bag bans leading to an increase in single-use plastic waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drop of pm 2.5 in large parts of china","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clean beaches due to lack of tourists","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in domestic waste due to online food ordering and use of single-use packaging","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of air pollution on global mortality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased concentrations of no2 and pm2.5 due to quarantine measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in waste management due to concerns about virus spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of recycling programs due to virus spread concerns","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decrease in noise levels due to reduced transportation and commercial activities","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive indirect effects of covid-19 on the environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative indirect effects of covid-19 on the environment","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in ghg emissions during a short period","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to the internet in rural areas may hinder the evaluation of residents’ knowledge, attitudes, and practices related to covid-19","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recruitment of research participants through online forms excludes residents without access to mobile phones, tablets, and computers, potentially biasing the study results","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparity in questionnaire response attention may skew the study results, leading to incomplete and potentially biased findings","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of correlation analysis between age and kap variables","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on previous studies for evidence of age correlation with covid-19 practices","category":"Technical risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for comprehensive health education program related to covid-19 prevention and control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalance of research participants affecting study findings","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between gender, age, and other characteristics and attitudes towards covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive correlation between knowledge and attitudes towards covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risky behavior related to food serving alone due to unemployment and inability to afford personal protective equipment like facemasks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparities in healthcare workers’ health practices affecting covid-19 prevention efforts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-demographic characteristics correlating with knowledge about covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low compliance with preventive measures like wearing masks and handwashing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender disparity in practicing preventive measures","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Riskiest behavior among certain demographic groups men, unemployed, and single individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants in marginalized areas may have less concern about covid-19","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"More information about covid-19 can lead to increased anxiety and worry","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in covid-19 prevention and mitigation practices among participants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High percentage of participants afraid to go to common places to avoid infection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disagreement on whether corona patients can be treated at home","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants in certain demographics showing lower attitude scores","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misunderstanding about covid-19 transmission and prevention","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Underrepresentation of certain regions in the study","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender disparity in covid-19 findings","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High levels of misinformation about covid-19 among participants may lead to incorrect beliefs and behaviors regarding the disease","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelming news exposure and reliance on tv and internet for information may impact participants’ understanding of covid-19 and influence their behaviors","category":"Social and Cultural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low mean covid-19 prevention and mitigation knowledge in specific risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of social networking apps for data collection and distribution","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Large number of participants from all indonesian regions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Close contact during data collection using social networking apps","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incomplete understanding of clinical features, signs, and symptoms of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and misconceptions about covid-19 transmission routes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent practices for preventing and mitigating covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of a questionnaire adapted from another source may lead to cultural and
